name: Little Island Brewing Co @ Gillman Barracks

reviews.text:
Love their craft beers, their Irish stout is my favourite drink of the night... strong with a hint of coffee..

Food wise... beef brisket was good, I love the sauce that came with the mozzarella cheese sticks!!!

Gambas came in a big portion but the prawns week frozen ones...
Kiddos enjoyed the bouncing castle! The food was good (recommend the wood fire oven pizzas). Even though it was a holiday kind of (mother's day), there was ample seating.

This local brewery at Gillman Barracks is an absolute gem! If you’re an IPA lover, their Dear Star and Stars & Bars are must-tries—hands down some of the best I’ve ever had. The beers are full of flavour, with just the right balance of hops and smoothness. Their Charcoal Pizza is another standout—crispy, smoky, and topped with fresh ingredients, it’s heavenly good.

The service here is top-notch, especially Maxwell, who was incredibly attentive and handled our special vegetarian food requests flawlessly by coordinating with the chef. His attention to detail really made our experience seamless.

What makes this spot even better for families is the bouncy castle—perfect for keeping the little ones entertained while parents enjoy some great craft beers. Overall, it’s a fantastic place to unwind with excellent food, drinks, and service. Highly recommended for both beer enthusiasts and families alike!
Dropped by for a lunch and they were celebrating St Patrick's day! Enjoyed a good performance of Irish tap dance! Good job on the 2 dancers there! Thank you for the show and awesome Irish Stew !
Always love their beers and doesn't disappoint. Food is great and just love the whole vibe of the place.
